00037 #include "egs_projectors.h"
00038 #include "egs_functions.h"
00039 
00040 EGS_Projector::EGS_Projector(const EGS_Vector &A, const string &Type) :
00041     a(A), xo(EGS_Vector()), d(0), type(Type) {
00042     norm = a.length();
00043     a.normalize();
00044     if (a.x*a.x + a.y*a.y > 0) {
00045         v1 = EGS_Vector(-a.y,a.x,0);
00046         v1.normalize();
00047     }
00048     else {
00049         v1 = EGS_Vector(1,0,0);
00050     }
00051     v2 = a%v1;
00052 }
00053 
00054 EGS_Projector::EGS_Projector(const EGS_Vector &x1, const EGS_Vector &x2,
00055                              const EGS_Vector &x3, const string &T) : type(T) {
00056     v1 = x2-x1;
00057     v2 = x3-x1;
00058     a = v1%v2;
00059     xo = x1;
00060     if (a.length2() < 1e-10) egsFatal("EGS_Projector::EGS_Projector: "
00061                                           " the vectors are co-linear\n");
00062     a.normalize();
00063     norm = 1;
00064     v1.normalize();
00065     v2 = a%v1;
00066     d = a*x1;
00067 }
00068 
00069 void EGS_Projector::printInfo() const {
00070     egsInformation(" normal = (%g,%g,%g)\n",a.x,a.y,a.z);
00071 };
